TopicTitle: RankAmateur characters drawn Templar of Kayne style

Articles.Content:
![Jy0Tn.png](http://i.imgur.com/Jy0Tn.png)

If you\'re wondering what this is about:

[www.rankamateur.thecomicseries.com](http://www.rankamateur.thecomicseries.com)

[https://www.thegamecrafter.com/games/templars-of-kayne](https://www.thegamecrafter.com/games/templars-of-kayne)

ToK is a game made by some friends of mine. A story arc in RankAmateur will be based on it.
